BR_text.BRsummary: Hangup error when passing large file through remote worker
BR_text.BRdescription:
Getting the below error when passing a large file through a worker connected remotely (through our Nimbix worker) between nodes.
 <denchmark-code>2017-03-23T00:19:27.349Z e10b83f1b8a42049333e8f82f723aa9f490b7a0f Failed to archive as "outputs/model" from "/home/nimbix/.deepforge/worker/worker_1490228329510/tmp/0/e10b83f1b8a42049333e8f82f723aa9f490b7a0f/outputs/model", err: Error: socket hang up
 2017-03-23T00:19:27.349Z { Error: socket hang up
     at createHangUpError (_http_client.js:252:15)
     at Socket.socketCloseListener (_http_client.js:284:23)
     at emitOne (events.js:101:20)
     at Socket.emit (events.js:188:7)
     at TCP._handle.close [as _onclose] (net.js:492:12) code: 'ECONNRESET', response: undefined }
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for the issue :) How big was the file again?

comments_1.comment_text: 400mb! Put it on s3 for you :)

comments_2.comment_text:
this could be the fix: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/webgme/webgme/tree/master/config#server>https://github.com/webgme/webgme/tree/master/config#server</denchmark-link>
 
 (more of a note for fixing it - it should still be fixed in the repo, of course)
